QuestData.Title: The Speaker Listens
QuestData.Description:
Magni has sent for you in Krokul Hovel once more. He seems to have made a new breakthrough in trying to reach Argus.
I suggest you find him immediately. His last vision foretold Aggramar's coming, and there is still so much we do not know of Sargeras' plans.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Magni in the Krokul Hovel.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Magni in the Krokul Hovel.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank ye fer joinin' me, $Glad:lass;. There's somethin' ye have to see.
